pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: patagilj anga kitulu, tjumaq ti sinsi i tatuluan, qivu a nia penuvuluvulung, “gacalju! kisukubi! aya.”

我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pasiqaca amen a qivu ta, “navenala sun sinsi aya amen.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kitulutulu amen, tuluan amen ni sinsi tua supu nua kinacalisianan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kilayng amen tjay sinsi a semupu, semenay amen tua sasupuan a senay.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: liav anga aravac a ku kinacaqu a kinacalisianan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: piqadav aken a sema kakituluan, piqadav aken a kicaquan tua kinacalisianan, muri ku siqayvu a palangda tjay kina.
I go to school every day, I learn the paiwan language every day, and I want to tell my mother.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a ku ngadan ti Ravaci.
My name is Ravaci.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a ngadan ni kama ti Karuqu.
My dad’s name is Karuqu.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a ngadan ni kina ti Paules.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tucu a cavilj tapuluq anga ku cavilj.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: macidilj a ku kaka a uqaljay a tjavulung, ti Qipu a ngadan nimadju, tapuluq katu ita a cavilj nimadju a tucu a cavilj.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tjengelay aken a ljemanguy, nu i putideq a qadav, tiamen a tacemekeljan vayk amen a maciuciur a ljemanguy.

我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tjengelay aken a kisekeljangan tua adju, makaya amen a maciur a semenay kata ljemanguy.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aljak aken nua Paiwan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aljak aken nua Vuculj.
I am an Paiwan child.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: imazi i akav a nia umaq.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: man lima a pipenuljatan a nia kinacemekeljan.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a nia kinacemekeljan matjelu amen a marekakakaka.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a ku kinacemekeljan izua it kama, ti kina, tia kaka katua tiaken.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kisacu a ku kama, saka qacaqaca aravac a kinalingdjeljan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: sirupucemel a ku kina, saka kuljakuljay aravac a kinacavacavan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu i tjumaq ti kama kemacalisianan tjanuamen.

我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu kalja pulavayan tua kaljazulezulan vayk amen a pasa qinaljan.

我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: maciur amen katia kaka a kikiav.
My brother and sister and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tjengelay aken aravac tua nia kinacemekeljan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: vayk amen a kivangavang kati kina tucu a qadav.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: namalingling a kalevelevan nu kamauqadavan, ika zalangzang ika vucelelj a kinaqadaqadavan, sarunguanguaq a vali.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: keman amen tua pang itua cauciuci a kadjunangan, cenglaven a nia kinacavacavan , maseljec amen aravac.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kamasukincengelj, madjaljar anga azua kalevelevan.

我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅黃色了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: matucu ti kina, palemek tu muri mangtjez anga raljiz aya.

我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka pasa umaumaq i djalan, kiligu aken tua vitjuqan.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tu ika mangtjez a raljiz, navenarung aken tua vaykanan a masasav.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a nia kakituluan izuwa i tjuljivar ta nia umaq, piqadav aken a djemavac a sema kakituluan, sake djavac uta pasa umaq.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: izua vayk a zemuking tua qezung, izua vayk a semuap.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: vayk amen uta semuap tua mareka i putuputung tua kakituluan, nia sikarasudj sa nia sikapangapangalj a sengesengan, namaljenguaq a piqadav a nia kakituluan.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tatiav, kasiqinaljan aken a na ljemilji tjay vuvu i Ubak.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka pacun ti vuvu i Ubak tjanuaken, pakanan aken tua siasiak, sake patekeli tua uca.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aza talem ni vuvu i Ubak a siasiak qaljemeqem aravac, paqulid tu sanguaq angata.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tjengelay aken uta tua uca ni vuvu i Ubak, sanguaq aravac nu tja tekelen.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kincengecengelj, kemsa amen kati vuvu i Muni tua cengelj.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: namakakaizuazua a kinsa cengelj ni vuvu i Muni, izua ciqav, kuka, ljasiak katua cirat.

我今天七點到學校。: Muni奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu nakincengelj anga itjen, vayk anga sema puljacengan a kiljaceng.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: malap tu liav ta vurasi, ta vasa katua laukiu ti vuvu i Muni, tua sipakacu tjanuaken a pasa umaq.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: Muni奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ku kipusauan tiamadju, sa ku kipazazekati tu mangetezanan aken nu tjayvililj a ljemilji tjayamadju.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kinacu amen a vuaq nua nia sinsi a sema puqemuzimuzipan, na kitaljizan amen izuwa i sitjumaq tua paljing a veneli tua kipu.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka temdep anga amen izuwa i puqemuzimuzipan, qivu aza nia sinsi: ”aicu i paqayaqayav a mareka qayaqayam, azua i pasalikuz a mareka qatjuvi, vayku a masatalj a kitju talidu aya.”

我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35053/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pacun anga aken tua liav aravac a qayaqayam, i vavav tua kasiv tiamadju a kipasasivasivalj a mipereper, izua uta ku pinacunan a ljequ a nataqed itua buang nua kasiv.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: azua i puqemuzimuzipan izua zau, rigi kata likuljav, inia ke pacun tua mareka qemuzimuzip a kemasicuay, tucu a vauaq a qadav kanapacun anga aken maleva aken aravac.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu tjayvililj uri kiciur aken tjay kama kati kina a semamaza.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: azua i dudut tua umaq ni kama i Kuliv izua za maljekudral a papaquzipan tua qemuzimuzip, vayk amen a maka tulay a maciur a sema papaquzipan tua qemuzimuzip.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka muri pasa vayk amen, manu cinakav anga utubay, pay pasa amin anga nia makavavav tua basu a vayk izuwa.

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kakedrian aken imaza i kazangiljan a nia umaq, ka kitulu anga aken, setavat anga amen a mamaza i Akav, imaza amen sakamaya i lizuk a kikavaljuvaljut.
When we were young, our family lived in Chiayi. After I started school, we moved to Pingtung and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在佳義，上學以後，就搬到了屏東，一直在都市裡生活。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka semupu anga aken tua sikipakelayan a kakituluan, kitulu aken tu masan italj tua pakata kakudakudan nua kacalisian a kakituluin, silautan tua namakakaizuazua namalavi a kakudakudan nua i taivang a kacalisian.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: vanasika, tucu a cavilj nu sikalja pulavayan tua kaljazulezulan, muri vayk amen kati kaka i Cemelesay a sema qinaljan a kivavadaq tua vavulungan, navenarung amen tu lemaut tua driniungan nua nia kakudakudan.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: azua vavulungan alu anga puluq a cavilj, ljakua nu tjapacunan matu i cengeceng a kinacaviljan.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ku kivadaqan timadju tu anemanema nu kayan a kacaquin, aza nimadju a Vinuculjan(Pinaiwanan) sulapiq a siqaqivuan, macaqu uta qivu tua Drinkayan, Kinilangan kata Drinipungan.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Paiwan, as well as Rukai, Hakka and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的排灣語說得很流利，也會說魯凱族語、客家話和日本話。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka ku kivadaqan anga timadju kemljang anga aken, tu manu kemasi kedrikedri a kicaquan tua [Drinipungan, a cekelj seRukai, au aza itua sengesengan nasekeljang tua tjuruvu aravac a Kilang, vanasika liav a kacaquin a kay nimadju.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Rukai, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來小時候就學日本話，太太是魯凱族人，而在工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu kivadavadaq amen, aza ramaljemaljeng masan lialiav aravac a pakata kinasicuay a kinljangan tua siqaljupan a sipareqaivuivu.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: uitu inika amen a makapucug a pipenuljatan, ljakua nia sinipuseqetj anga paseqailjungan a pitua pinilima a ljingas, makaya siumaljanan sa sileqeleq a kisalangda.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kakedrianan aken ika aken a nalemaut tua kakudakudan nua ku kinadriungan, pitua ku kinakacalisianan izua za ku siaqan.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu tjaliav anga ku linaut, patjazua ku kinavarungan tua kinasePaiwanan, na remamur a kinisumaljian, mapuqata uta a simiazuan.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Paiwan is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為排灣族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tucu a qadav nu masulesulem, muri sema umaq a ku kaka ti Ljegeay.
My younger brother Ljegeay is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，Ljegeay弟弟就要回家了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na vayk amen kati vuvu i Sauniav a matatakayan a veneli tua kuka, muri nia kesain a semanguanguaq tua pinadjulu tu kaiven ni Ljegeay a ku kaka.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和Sauniav奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給Ljegeay弟弟。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka cemalivat amen tua temakatakay ta ljaceng, aza sitakatakay a ljaceng liva anan azua namilidji a tjaukaljaceng.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，攤子有好多鮮嫩的青菜。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na veneli anga amen tua incay, tua qaqilj kata qudidilj a caytav.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aza i tjuljivar a temakatakay tua vangalj a rutakatakay qivu a matucu, “aicu a ku pangudral kata qudis qaljemeqem aravac. pay veliu a pupida lja aya!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na veneli amen tua pangudral kata qudis.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka cemalivat amen tua temakatakay tua vutjulj, aza rutakatakay qivu a matucu, “anema su velin? aicu a kuka a vuaq kakudralan saka na venutjulj, nu taitan tjelu a iday a vatanan.” aya.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，攤販說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大隻又肥，一隻300元。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: paka pazangal aravac ti vuvu i Sauniav, pay sa kivadaq tua za rutakatakay tu aki makaya patjamadjuluin.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: Sauniav奶奶覺得太貴了，並且問攤販可不可以便宜一點。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ljakua azua rutakatakay matucu sinipumadjulu anga aravac, inika anga makaya patjamadjuluin aya.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但攤販說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: azuwa i ljaqedi a rutakatakay matucu a qivu, kelju veliu tua ku ciqav, aicu a ku ciqav kakudrakudralan saka madjulu aya.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的攤販說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka vililj anga veneli anga amen tua kuka sane veli uta tua ciqav, sa satjumaq a kemsa tu tadataran tua djamay.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: cuay anga kiljaljavaljava, mizemzem anga qadav.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經暗了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na papangtjez tua ljingas a ku kaka ti Ljegeay a matucu, na papintjus aza i pusivitjayan tu inika makaya pulavay, nu tjaivililj anga sipulavayan a qinadavan mana mangtjez anga aken aya.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: Ljegeay弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: matucu a qivu ti vuvu i Sauniav liav a ku kinsa, pay pukanui a masantalj aya.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: Sauniav奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na cemged amen tua mareka nia vetjek tua nia adjuadju, a kipumangtjez a kipatjinguaq tua napenakakaizuan a kaiven.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: izua za ku seljaseljang a ti Cumay, ru alim a kemacu ta nemanga.
I have a classmate named Cumay, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Cumay，他常常忘記帶東西。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu sikitulutuluan, kisedjam timadju tua seljaseljang ta sivecivecik, ta siquliqulip katu vavecikan.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: si kintalj, si kinmusalj, si kintjelulj a nemanga sipasedjasedjam tjaimadju niamen a masantalj.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ljakua izua za nakuya a kakudan nimadju, ru kisedjam tua nema sa ika pacikel.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka vililj anga neka anga nu venarung tua pasedjam tu nemanga tjanuamen a pimasantaljan.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: izua ka itua tu qadav, vayk amen a maciur a masantalj a kivangavang.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka i djalan tazua, manu malingav ti Cumay tu masausavan, ljakua namalim timadju a masi qucic.
On the way, Cumay wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Cumay想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pasa kisedjam timadju tua nia seljaseljang ta qucic, ljakua nia tevelain a masantalj, tu ika aken a nakemacu uta niayain.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學們借衛生紙，可是我們大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: manu patjeljaqaung ti Cumay ka maqutjav, madudu timadju sa mayatucu, aku ika aken a nu pasedjaman tua qucic a masantalj aya!
Cumay burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Cumay急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pasemalavan timadju nua seljaseljang, ayatua ika sun a kitju kacu tua nemanga, sa aza sinipasedjam tjanusun a nemanga, ika sun angata a pacikel ayain!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka macepeliv a qadav tua sisa kakituluan, na medjama sa djaljun i kakituluan ti Cumay, sa aza mareka kinisedjasedjam tua seljaseljang ni Cumay a nemanga pacikelen tjanuamen a seljaseljang.
The next day at school, Cumay arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Cumay很早就到學校了，Cumay把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kipaqaljay tjanuamen a seljaseljang ti Cumay, sa mayatucu timadju kemasi tucu a qadav tjara kitju kacu anga aken tua nemanga aya, maljimalji uta tua tjanumun a ku seljaseljang aicu a sitjaisangasan a nasecalivat anga pukauy mun a pasedjama tua nemanga tjanuaken aya.
Cumay apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Cumay向同學們道歉，並說他從今以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ti kama namasan ruqaljuqaljup i qinaljan.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kakedrian aken, ti kama kati kama i Kuljelje nu salilim a sivaivaik a sasav, sa namasi takit kata kuang.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和Kuljelje叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu quljan anga, mangtjez anga tiamadju a namasi qinaljup.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: izua nu vavuy, izua nu lava, izua uta nu namasi padavatan.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tiamadju pangaljen aza qinaljup, sa pangapangaljan tua sikataqaljan.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會將獵物分好，分享給族人。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nuaya makaljavay aken, tua kiayan tjaikama a qemaljup.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: matucu ti kama nu ljemtu anga sun ku ciurav anga a kemacu aya.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aza i qinaljan a uqaljaqaljay macaqu uta puraung tua sacemel, macaqu tiamadju a puseluc kata puqacev.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: macaqu aravac ti kama seman puseluc, matucu ti kama, aicu a sidjamedjameq tua padavatan, tjagetjemen a kileqeleq a djinkapan nua sacemel, aicu a sinipuraung tjapizuain itua sinangalivan nua sacemel aya.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tua sikitaluan a kiayan tua tjavavulungan a qemaljup, piqdav aken a kicaquan tua seman qaljangetj, ika nacuay aza ku sinan puraung makay anga paqulid a djemameq tua sacemel.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以早一點和長輩一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，沒多久我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka napacun anga ti kama mayatucu tjanuaken nu tjaivililj tjara sun a masan djuljam tua siqaljupan aya.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tucu ljemtu anga aken, ku siniljavac a semevalj aza ku tiveljatan kata vakela, sake vayk a kiciur tjaikama a qemaljup.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka djemaljun amen i qinaljan nia sipangapangalj a semiljeva za nia qadav tua nia sikataqaljan.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: matucu ti kama, maleva itjen tua papumanguaqan nua tja tjaisangasangas, saka izua sa liav aravac a tja qimang aya.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka kadjaman na gemalju aken a talu gaku.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ku alimen a ku kaban, ka ma gaku aken.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: neka’ nuku kinacu.
I didn’t bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: miseljan amen ka ta ku ali a pacun tua hon ni madju, ka sumupusupu amen.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pinasedjam aken tua sisupisupil, ka ta inpic naku ali ka sikin amen.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ivu aniya sinsi tja nuaken “maya sa gemaljuanga midjamau a paceked!”
The teacher told me, “Wake up earlier next time and don’t be late again!”
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tji sulja ku ali a ravac a ljak na kacalisia a nguta tji madju.
My good friend’s name is sulja, and he is also an paiwan child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫sulja，他也是排灣族的小孩。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ku salad a sumupu i djiniljepan.
We study together in the djiniljepan tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在安坡部落讀書。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: lemandandamen tua sinimilingang kemasi tu nija vavulungna si ka makeyamen na kemacalisyanang.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Paiwan proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說排灣語。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: acaaca aken kurakural aken tji silja kerikeri’ sa kuljakuljai a ngauta.
I am tall and overweight, while sulja is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，sulja很矮也很瘦。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ginki tji sulja, tjengelai ya tjimaimanga
sulja is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: sulja很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: undukaidukai a nia gaku a tucu, masanliau a kamuku a ru si pisaipisai.
Today was the school’s sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: izua mavaviljevilj, temukurus tu a mali, zemian kata penana’.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kian na ken ta mekelj.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na matjani a ken ka mekekelj,saka na pedjamu’ a ku cunganlj.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ljakua, ,migacal a ekn sa mekelj a pacusu.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka macuvung a ken, na maleva a tjimaimanga.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: sa ini’ kaken a na tjamakaya, ljkua maleva aken tu ku ina cuvun.
Although I didn’t get first place, I’m glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na vaik aken ka tji kama a ljemizau tjai kama i paljan.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na mapasae’tju a kula ni kama i paljan.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: pasemalau tji kama i paljan tja nuamen aza uma’ nji madju na mabuan a za alju.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka ljemungua’ tji madju makelu a kema si alju.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tji kama na kemacu tu a vutjul na ljuan kata saviki aru sipantez tjai kama i paljan.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na imilad aken katji kama i paljan i ta tataedan ni madju sa pasemalamalau tja nu ken ta canalivatan ni madju.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka ru vaik anganken zemenger tji kama i paljan tja nuaken na mea’canga sa saua’lai yanga sun aya.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu sarungua’ angang su kula kivalau a matja nuamen ayaken na kipusau tji kama i paljan.
I said, “When your foot gets better, come to our house next time and visit us.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka 2022 a cavilje a tja sihu ljemaui tu makayanga akipavecik tua tjia kinacalisianan a ngadan pita nibonsiu.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na kiaivuan aken tu na kisamulja cuacuai a tji sulja pakata venecik a pita nibonsiu a kinacalisian a ngadan.
I interviewed sulja, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年sulja。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na mareaivu amen. tu micevun nu niciu a mata uma’ nji madu.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka tazua, pasemalauvin a ken tu a na kemasinu sa ngada nji madju sa siukai tua matjaljaljak kata inljan nji madju.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: kivada’ aken nakuya a tja sikivecikan na tjucu aku sun a kiaun tu paumaljin?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: temevela tji madju, a ljinautjian na vinecikan ini’ ka makaya lemuluai tua ku kinacalisianangn a ngadan mapasaliukamaya liau a napasamli sa sikapedjelian.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Shu Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35053/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「舒先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: na ivu tji sulja a kinacalisianang a sivecikan pa’ulid tu njitjen na ngadan. njitjen na zukuan tja kina cemekeljan atja djmu’ ulja na makaya a tjatjuruvu a caucau a kipavecik tuatja kinacalisianang a ngadan.
cemelesai said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35053/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: sulja說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: ka tjiyau vaik amen ka tji vuvu a sema papaveliyan a paveli,na kemacu tji vuvu tu a makara ljacen,sa na seman kakanen a ngauta ta ru sipaveli.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: tjenglai a caucau tua nji vuvu a siubai, aza silji kata ljameljam mapa veli a ravac, sa tjuruvu a ngautan a caucau tu keman ta kinesa nji vuvu.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and ginger, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和生薑很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aza cinavu ka ta pinu ljameljam a kinsa kata pinu makau a vutjulj na vavui salum sa na masiup pa makara caucau sa tjuruvu a na paitui i ta na siubai.
The taro buns and ginger rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的芋粉包和生薑飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: nu kemesakesa tji vuvu tjaken a paveliveli, sa ku pasiaca a zemalazala. tjiamen a na tejmalem ini’ a  katjedukuan kelju kelju veliu.
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35053/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: palamu maka paveli a ngamen. tjisun sa na makaya tjen na mayatucu aya tji vuvu a ivu tja nuaken.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: aicu a njia kinianan a siubaibbai liau angan ku kineljan a pa ka tana kacalisian a djami a kakanen sa na pavavalanga ken tu zelian nu siubaibai.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

pitju a tukiyan ka djemaljun aken i kaki: a puvarungan kata tjengelaiyan nji vuvu tua kakaen na kinacalisianan na masi miazuan kata masilevan aken a ravac.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
